LanguageData.RC2_AmbrosiaInebriated.stages.0.label: alcohol warmth on nectar
LanguageData.RC2_AmbrosiaInebriated.stages.0.descript: I just feel a bit more relaxed after that drink. That's good.
LanguageData.RC2_AmbrosiaInebriated.stages.1.label: quite inebriated on nectar
LanguageData.RC2_AmbrosiaInebriated.stages.1.descript: I'm a bit wobbly! And this is quite enjoyable.
LanguageData.RC2_AmbrosiaInebriated.stages.2.label: drunk on nectar
LanguageData.RC2_AmbrosiaInebriated.stages.2.descript: I feel so uninhibited and unafraid! This is a great time!
LanguageData.RC2_AmbrosiaInebriated.stages.3.label: hammered on nectar
LanguageData.RC2_AmbrosiaAlcoholWithdrawal.stages.1.d: Feeling shaky. Everything pisses me off. I keep thinking of of that time I tasted the nectar of the gods. Nothing feels good anymore. I need more.
